MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA18 postcode area of Cumnock, affecting properties in Ballantine Court and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.53pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs we now require further resource onsite and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.44pm on Monday 25th January 2021.
